package.description: A node which gets two 3D point clouds (one textured, one normal) from a stereo dcam, fits a plane to the textured cloud, gets the blobs lying on it from the normal cloud, computes a convex hull, creates an RGB histogram and matches it using HIK (the Histogram Intersection Kernel) to a "database" of previously stored models.
package.author: Radu Bogdan Rusu
